段: “Am3-kong-tsiau2 tio7 e7 bo5 khuann3 tioh8 li2.”
Tshan5-tshi2 tio7 khi3 nng3 ian-tang5-khoo, ko7 hue2-thun5-loo.
錢鼠講：「目tsiu kek hoo7 mi-mi，
“Am3-kong-tsiau2 tio7 e7 bo5 khuann3 tioh8 li2.”
Am3-kong-tsiau2 khuann3 kah tshio3 kah: “Heh, heh, heh!”
U7 tsit8 tsui2 ke-a2-kiann2 taN9 tshut-si3,
Kut-keh koh tshoo, tshui3-pe koh pinn2.
Pat8 tsiah ke-a2 tiann7-tiann7 ai3 ting3--i.
有一擺，伊hong5 jiok到魚池a2邊，
U7 tsit8 pai2, i hong5 jiok kau3 hi5-ti5-a2 pinn,
Bo5 siunn7 kong2 e7-hiau2 siu5, koh e7 tshang3-tsui2-bi7.
Bu5-po5 kun5 tsit8 phun-kng e5 bah-kenn-thng,
Bu5-po5 ka7 i ian2 jip8 khi3 phun-kng.
Puann3-loo7 tu2 tioh8 tsit8 tin7 ia2-kau2.
Ia2-kau2 kong2: “Bah-kenn! Bah-kenn! Au2! Au2! Au2!”
Ia2-kau2 tue3 leh tsau2, hau2 kah: “Au2! Au2! Au2!”
Absalom khia5-be2, nng3 tui3 tshiu7-na5 kue3,
Thiann3 kah e7 kainn, koh e7 hainn.
Poo7-ha7 gia5 to khi2 lai5 tainn2.
Thau5-mng5 a7 u7 tng5, a7 u7 te2.
Tai7-tsi3 long2 bueh kuann2-kin2 tso3 hoo7 sing5,
Hip-ue kah ban7-ko long2 ka7 khng3,
Khng3 kong2: “Kin2 a7 tsit8 tiann2, ban7 a7 tsit8 tiann2.
Hip-ue kong2: “U7-iann2 tsiah8 kin2 long3 phua3 tiann2.”
Tak8 te3 kuai-kuai to2-penn5-penn5, tsin ho2 kiann5.
Loh8-hoo7-thinn tah8 tioh8 tsui2 koh e7 tsuann7 lang5.
Tua7-lang5 gin2-a2 tui3 i long2 tsin giam2.
Tua7-lang5 khuann3 tioh8 i, tio7 kin2 siam2.
Gin2-a2 khuann3 tioh8 i, tio7 ka7 tsam3,
A-bin2-i5 tak8 pai2 kun5 muai5 long2 kham3-kua3,
Am2 phu7 kah kui 灶頂，變am2-phueh8。
Am2 phu7 kah kui tsau3-ting2, pinn3 am2-phueh8.
A-bin2-i5 ka7 am2-phueh8 kuah hoo7 tsit8 te3 tsit8 te3,
Pinn3 na2 tsut8-bi2-tsua2, pinn3 na2 jun7-piann2-phue5,
袋tua3塑膠袋a2底，袋kah一袋一袋，
Te7 tua3 sok-ka te7-a2-te2, te7 kah tsit8 te7 tsit8 te7,
Khng3 tua3櫥a2底，khng3 kah一格一格。
Khng3 tua3 tu5-a2-te2, khng3 kah tsit8 keh tsit8 keh.
M7-ko3 A-bin2姨 e5 tsut8米紙kian3 kauh，kian3破。
M7-ko3 A-bin2-i5 e5 tsut8-bi2-tsua2 kian3 kauh, kian3 phua3.
Bit8-po5 tsau2 lai5 kah i tso3-phuann7.
Nng7 e5 thit-tho5 kah thinn bueh kng.
Khoo-a2-lah ainn7 enn-a2 peh tshiu7-a2, si3 ki kha,
M7 kiann e7 puah8 loh8 khi3 tshiu7-a2-kha.
Kau5 pho7 enn-a2 peh tshiu7-a2, kiam2 tsit8 kha,
Tsiann5 kiann e7 puah8 loh8 khi3 tshiu7-a2-kha.
伊想講：「Ainn7嬰a2 peh樹a2,四支腳，
I siunn7 kong2: “Ainn7 enn-a2 peh tshiu7-a2, si3 ki kha,
“Khah ke ma7 be7 puah8 loh8 khi3 tshiu7-a2-kha,”
I tio7 bueh oh8 tshiunn7 khoo-a2-lah.
I tio7 uann7 ainn7 enn-a2 peh tshiu7-a2.
Tshue7 he tsiah8 be7 lau7 e5 ioh8-tshau2.
Ha7-ua khioh gin5-hing7 hoo7 A-tong tshi3.
Ha7-ua peh po5-to5-tsi2 hoo7 A-tong tshi3.
Tsua5 ka7 Ha7-ua kong2: “Kim3-ko2 siang7-kai3 ho2.”
夏娃挽來試，真kah意，koh ka7亞當tshi7。
Ha7-ua ban2 lai5 tshi3, tsin kah-i3, koh ka7 A-tong tshi7.
Nng7 e5 na2 tsiah8, nua7 na2 lau5,
A-ka in a-kong phua3-penn7, ai3 lang5 tshi7.
A-ka志願tshi7 in阿公，koh tshi7 in弟弟。
A-ka tsi3-guan7 tshi7 in a-kong, koh tshi7 in ti-ti.
伊khat in阿公e5 muai5，khat一湯匙，
I khat in a-kong e5 muai5, khat tsit8 thng-si5,
In a-kong, thau5-khak hainn3-hainn3--leh, tshui3 mi-mi.
A-ka換khat in弟弟e5 muai5，khat一湯匙，
A-ka uann7 khat in ti-ti e5 muai5, khat tsit8 thng-si5,
A-ka koh khat in弟弟e5 muai5，khat一湯匙，
A-ka koh khat in ti-ti e5 muai5, khat tsit8 thng-si5,
In a-kong a5-m3 tsit8-e7, ka7 tsiah8--khi3.
A-lip8-peh khuann3 tioh8 tsit8 e5 siau3-lian5-ke,
Phing7 ti7樹a2頭，khun3 kah m7知醒。
Phing7 ti7 tshiu7-a2-thau5, khun3 kah m7 tsai tshenn2.
I siunn7 kong2: “I e7 tshin-tshiunn7 gua2 an2-ne,
少年家suah kah A-lip8伯起冤家，
A-lip8-peh tng3 tsit8-e7, bak8-tsiu tshut hue2-tshenn,
Bak8-tsiu peh-kim, tsiah tsai khun3 tsit8 tshenn2,
Siunn7 kong2: “Ka-tsai3! Gua2 iau2 si7 siau3-lian5-ke!”
愛麗絲頷頸a2彎彎，親像鵝，
Am7-kun2-a2 tshiunn7 tsua5, khun5 kui khun5.
A-tsa-kui2 teh tshiau pun3-so3-thang2, tshue7 po2-pue3,
Tshiau kah pun3-so3 ue3 kah tsit8-si3-ke3.
A-tsa-kui2 kong2: “Tso3 khuan5-po2, tak8-ke7 e5 khang-khue3.
I tio7 ka7 pun3-so3 khioh hoo7 i ho2-se3.
A-tsa鬼koh ka7 pun3-so3 ue3 kah一si3-ke3。
A-tsa-kui2 koh ka7 pun3-so3 ue3 kah tsit8-si3-ke3.
Phah-lah8--e5 ka7 tong7-but8 e5 thau5 ting3 tua3 piah,
A7 u7 kiunn-a2, a7 u7 iunn5-a2, a7 u7 tsui2-gu5-kang2.
Thau5-khak ui3 piah hit ping5 tshun--jip8-lai5.
Ka7 tong7-but8 e5 thau5 tian2 hoo7 lang5-kheh khuann3.
Tshing5-a2-hioh8, au2 lai5 pun5 kah pu-pu-kio3.
有一日，大榕樹hoo7人剉kah清清清。
U7 tsit8 jit8, tua7-tshing5-tshiu7 hoo7 lang5 tsho3 kah tshing-tshing-tshing.
路頭變菜市；店a2 teh賣冰。
Loo7-thau5 pinn3 tshai3-tshi7; tiam3-a2 teh be7 ping.
A-kong giah8 ti5-thau5, kut8 bo5 suan-liu-koo2,
Kut8 tioh8 tsit8 liap8 tua7 liap8 oo7,
Mooh tng2 lai5 hoo7 A-ma2 tso3 oo7-ni5.
A-kong giah8 ti5-thau5, to3-tng2 khi3 tsing3 oo7.
U7 tsit8 e5 lang5 to2 ti7 tshau2-poo, teh khuann3 thinn.
I khuann3 thinn na2 tit8-tit8 ke7--loh8-lai5,
Kiann tsit8-e7, bih jip8 khi3 tshu3-lai7,
I uann7 to2 tua3 bin5-tshng5, uann7 khuann3 thian-pong5.
I khuann3 thian-pong5 na2 tit8-tit8 ke7--loh8-lai5,
Kiann tsit8-e7, bih jip8 khi3 bin5-tshng5-kha,
Huah kong2: “Tshu3 hoo7 thinn teh-lap--loh8-lai5 a!”
I siunn7 kong2: “Tann, si2 a! Bin5-tshng5 lap--loh8-lai5 a!”
Tshat8-a2 khi3 lang5 e5 tshu3 bueh thau-theh8.
Tshat8-a2 siunn7 kong2: “Gua2 tsai-iann2 u7 mng5-sin5.
「M7-ko3 to m7 bat聽過有窗a2門神。」
“M7-ko3 to m7 bat thiann kue3 u7 thang-a2-mng5-sin5.”
I tio7 peh tui3窗a2門入--去。
I tio7 peh tui3 thang-a2-mng5 jip8--khi3.
伊換bueh peh tui3窗a2門出--去。
I uann7 bueh peh tui3 thang-a2-mng5 tshut--khi3.
Thai3-kong too7-kun2-a2 iong7 liau2 bueh tng2--khi3.
Lui5-kong tio7 tshut tua7-tua7-lat8 ka7 kong3.
Hong tio7 tshut tua7-tua7-lat8 ka7 sak.
Tang5-lang5 puah8 loh8 suann, tit8-tit8 siak,
Siak jip8 khi3 Kim-tshenn e5 tshim-khenn.
Sua-hi5 ti7 hai2-pinn tu2 tioh8 long5,
“Jin5-lui7 ka7 lan2 kong2 kah tsin phainn2-thiann.
Tsit8 tin7 gin2-a2 lai5 hai2-pinn, bueh sng2-tsui2,
Khuann3 tioh8 sua-hi5 kah long5, tsin tioh8-kiann.
Hoo5-li5 khuann3 tshiu7-a2-ting2 tui7 tsit8 kuann7 po5-to5,
看一隻烏鴉食kah na2 iau-lo5,
Khuann3 tsit8 tsiah oo-a tsiah8 kah na2 iau-lo5,
Tio7 ka7 oo-a tho2 bueh tsiah8 po5-to5.
Oo-a hue5 tioh8 tsit8 liap8 sik8 po5-to5.
Tu2-ho2 hoo5-li5 in kiann2 tsau2--lai5, khuann3--tioh8,
Tio7 ka7 hoo5-li5 tho2 bueh ban2 po5-to5.
Tsit8 e5 se3-han3 gin2-a2 tsau2 liau2 phang3-kian3--khi3,
Kong2: “Gua2 e5 kiann2, koo tsit e5.
“Tshiann2 li2 hing5 gua2, thang kah gua2 tso3-phuann7.”
Long5 kong2: “Gua2 e5 kiann2, kui2-a7 e5.
“Iah bo5, nng7 e5 kah li2 sio-uann7.”
Sin ba2-suh huan5-lo2 tiann7 tsau2, khuai3 tshau3-lau7.
Lau7 ba2-suh kong2: “Pong7-lian2, tio7 bian2 tsau2.”
Te7-ji7 jit8, sin ba2-suh tshut khi3 suann--e phau2,
Khuann3 loo7--e tsit8 ki ti5-thau5, tio7 khi3 kauh,
Siak lueh suann-kau, siak kah mi-mi2-mauh-mauh,
Hong5拖轉去tan3 tua3 保養場後。
Hong5 thua tng2 khi3 tan3 tua3 po2-iang2-tiunn5 au7.
伊罵老巴士，講：「Long2 ma7你假gau5。」
I me7 lau7 ba2-suh, kong2: “Long2 ma7 li2 ke2-gau5.”
Lau7 ba2-suh kong2: “Li2 tsit e5 gong7-thau5.
“Ah u7 lang5 tua3 suann-kau bin7-ting2 kauh ti5-thau5!?”
有一日，天頂飛來一項物：
U7 tsit8 jit8, thinn-ting2 pue lai5 tsit8 hang7 mih8:
Tue3 tng2 khi3 te7-kiu5, thang siunn2-gueh8.
Sing-sing tio7 khi3 keh-piah khuann3 ge5-kho.
I-sing khuann3 i e5 tshui3, khuann3-khuann3--le,
Kong2: “Li2 kui-tshui3 tsit8 ki ge5 to bo5.
I khuann3 tioh8 oo e5, tio7 ai3 be2.
Long2 ka7 be2-be2 tng2 khi3 tshu3.
E2-a2 Bu5-po5 ma7 ai3 oo e5 e5.
伊看矮a2阿姨有烏鞋，hiah-ni7 tse7，
I khuann3 E2-a2 A-i5 u7 oo e5, hiah-ni7 tse7,
Tio7 ka7矮a2阿姨討，阿姨ma7講：「好。」
Tio7 ka7 E2-a2 A-i5 tho2, A-i5 ma7 kong2: “ho2.”
E2-a2 A-i5 e5 oo e5, i tshing7 be7 loh8.
Ah! He kam2 m7 si7 guan2 tshu3?
A9-a3! Tng2 lai5 kau3 guan2 e5 bin5-tshng5.
Gu5 kong2: “Tsit8 e5 lang5, si3 tsiah be2 thua,
“Tsit8 tsiah kim-gu5, tsit8 pah e5 lang5 thua,
“Soo2-i2 tsit8 tsiah gu5 ai3 si3-pah tsiah be2 thua.”
A-bin2-i5 siunn7 tioh8 tsit8 e5 ho2 pan7-huat:
Ling7-gua7 hit lian2 tsing5-lian2, hong lau3 tiau7.
A-bin2-i5 koh siunn7 tioh8 tsit8 e5 ho2 pan7-huat:
後lian2 e5 hong ma7 lau3 tiau7。
Au7-lian2 e5 hong ma7 lau3 tiau7.
A-bin2-i5 koh siunn7 tioh8 tsit8 e5 ho2 pan7-huat:
Ma-ma kong2: “ Bo5, li2 lai5 sai2.”
Pa-pa kong2: “ Buai3. Li2 sai2. Gua2 be7-hiau2 sai2.”
來ka7水瓶a2 thun7 kah水tinn7滿滿。
Lai5 ka7 tsui2-pan5-a2 thun7 kah tsui2 tinn7-mua2-mua2.
烏鴉tu2 bueh食，一隻狐狸來到tsia，
Oo-a tu2 bueh tsiah8, tsit8 tsiah hoo5-li5 lai5 kau3 tsia,
Hoo5-li5 kong2: “ Hm3. Gua2 tsin tshui3-ta.”
Tio7 ka7 tsui2 tsuinn7 kah ta-ta-ta.
Sng2 kuan3-si3, tsin e5 niau2-tshi2 bo5 tshu3-bi7.
A-li2-suh e5 se3-kai3 tak8-hang7 tsin ki5-kuai3.
Tsit8 e5 nau7-tsing lai5 gua2 bin7-thau5-tsing5,
Tshui3-kak khiau3-khiau3, kong2: “Tsap8 tiam2, kue3 tsap8 hun-tsing.
Koh tsit8 e5 nau7-tsing lai5 gua2 bin7-thau5-tsing5,
嘴角sue5-sue5，講：「七點，過二五分鐘。
Tshui3-kak sue5-sue5, kong2: “Tshit tiam2, kue3 ji7-goo7 hun-tsing.
我tshuah一下，跋落眠床腳，煞精神。
Gua2 tshuah tsit8-e7, puah8 loh8 bin5-tshng5-kha, suah tsing-sin5.
Gua2 pang3-oh8, tng2 lai5 kau3 guan2 tau,
Mng5-au7 kong2 si7 au7-bue2-mng5 e5 mng5-kha-khau2,
Tshu3-lai7 kong2 si7 gua7-khau2 e5 tshu3-au7!
M7-ko3 au7-bue2-mng5 khom7--khi3, khui be7 khui.
M7 sin3 siann3! Seh8 tng2 khi3 tshu3-thau5-tsing5,
Khui mng5, tsit8-e7 khuann3, iau2 si7 tshu3-au7-ping5.
Gua2 tua7-siann kio3 Ma-ma kin2 khui mng5.
媽媽講：「你門na2會鎖--le？緊開門！」
Ma-ma kong2: “Li2 mng5 na2 e7 so2--le? Kin2 khui mng5!”
Hui7-tsu2 tse7 ti7 tsui2-pinn khuann3 li2-hi5.
Oo li2-hi5 ka7 ang5 li2-hi5 kong2:
“Hit e5 lang5 siunn7 bueh ka7 lan2 liah8.”
Ang5 li2-hi5 kong2: “Li2 a7 m7 si7 i,
“Li2 na2 tsai-iann2 i siunn7 bueh ka7 lan2 liah8?”
Oo li2-hi5 kong2: “Li2 a7 m7 si7 gua2,
“Hit e5 lang5 siunn7 bueh ka7 lan2 liah8.
“M7 sian3, li2 mng7 i khuann3 u7-iann2 ah8 bo5-iann2.”
Tsit8 ki lah8-tshing3 khue3 ti7 tshiu7-a2-thau5.
I tio7 loh8 lai5 tsian7 lah8-tshing3,
Ka7 lah8-tshing3 theh8 khi2 lih tshiu7-a2-ting2,
Kok-ong5 tshing7 he sin sann bueh tshut-gua7.
Tsit8 e5 khit-tsiah8 khuann3 i tsin kho2-lian5,
Khi3 theh8 tsit8 nia2 than2-a2, tsit8 tiau5 am7-mua.
Kong2: “Pe7-ha7. Tsit nia2 than2-a2 hoo7 li2 mua.
Than2-a2 theh8 lai5 mua; am7-mua theh8 lai5 phuah8.
Tsit8 tsiah kia3-senn-a2 tiann7-tiann7 puann sin tshu3.
I khuann3 tioh8 tsit8 e5 ku7 ku-khak,
Ku-khak thua be7 kiann5, koh m7-kam ka7 pang3-sak.
I tio7 kio3 pat8 tsiah kia3-senn-a2 tso3-hue2 tua3;
Bueh tshut-gua7, tso3-hue2 thua, tso3-hue2 sak.
Khuann3 tioh8 e7-kha, kha suah e7 nng2.
U7 lang5 keh bo5 khuann3 tioh8 i.
Khiong2-liong5 liah8 tioh8 tsit8 tsiah ka-tsuah8.
恐龍講：「人類in tau ti7 tah？」
Khiong2-liong5 kong2: “Jin5-lui7 in tau ti7 tah?”
“Li2 kiann5 tsit8 ban7-ban7 ni5, tio7 e7 kau3.”
Gin2-a2 khia5 tua7 bue2 hi5, khi3 hai2-te2,
大尾魚載囡仔，海底si3-ke3 seh8。
Tua7 bue2 hi5 tsai3 gin2-a2, hai2-te2 si3-ke3 seh8.
Hi5-a2 tsit8 tin7 tsit8 tin7 sio-siam2--kue3,
Tsiok tse7 hing5, tsiok tse7 sik, au7 tua7, au7 se3.
“Se3-kai3 e5 gin2-a2 u7 thang tsit8 lang5 khia5 tsit8 bue2.”
大尾魚講：「Lin2囡仔，愈生，愈tse7 e5。
Tua7 bue2 hi5 kong2: “Lin2 gin2-a2, lu2 senn, lu2 tse7 e5.
“Guan2 hi5-a2, lu2 liah8, lu2 tsio2 bue2.
“Kau3 kah bue2, e7 bo5-kau3 thang hun-phue3.”
Tsit ping5 e5牛看hit ping5 e5草khah好食，
Tsit ping5 e5 gu5 khuann3 hit ping5 e5 tshau2 khah ho2-tsiah8,
Tio7 tham-thau5 kue3 khi3 hit ping5 tsiah8.
Hit ping5 e5牛看tsit ping5 e5草khah好食，
Hit ping5 e5 gu5 khuann3 tsit ping5 e5 tshau2 khah ho2-tsiah8,
Tio7 tham-thau5 kue3 lai5 tsit ping5 tsiah8.
兩ping5 e5牛long2講隔壁e5草khah好食。
Nng7 ping5 e5 gu5 long2 kong2 keh-piah e5 tshau2 khah ho2-tsiah8.
Tsiah8 kah bok8-tiunn5 pinn--a e5 tshau2 tah-tah-tah.
Bok8-tiunn5 lai7-te2 e5 tshau2 bo5 lang5 tsiah8.
兩ping5 e5人駛割草機來ka7割kah tah-tah-tah。
Nng7 ping5 e5 lang5 sai2 kuah-tshau2-ki lai5 ka7 kuah kah tah-tah-tah.
Tsit8 tsiah kim-kong puann lai5 tua3 suann-na5,
伊講：「聖經有講一個大衛王。
I kong2: “Sing3-king u7 kong2 tsit8 e5 Tai7-pit8-ong5.
“Na7 sing5-kong, lin2 tioh8 hu5 gua2 tso3 kau5-ong5.”
Kau5 tio7 khioh tsioh8-thau5, khian kim-kong,
Kau5-a2-kiann2 suah bian2 siunn7 bueh tso3 kau5-ong5.
Kok-ong5 tio7 sua2 ong5-kiong khi3 hai2-kinn5,
Tshing7 tiau-phue5 hiu5-a2 tshut lai5 ke-a2 kiann5,
Long2 kong2: “He tsin phann7, kann2 si7 sin-si5-kiann5.”
Kau2-a2 khuann3--tioh8, “hm7-hm7” kio3, bueh ka7 ka7.
Tsau2 tng2 khi3 i e5 suann-tong7.
Gu5 kong2: “Lai5. Gua2 ka7 li2 ainn7.”
Ku kah gu5 lai5 ka3 oo5-pinn.
Ku kong2: “Lai5. Gua2 ka7 li2 ainn7.”
Tsit8 tsiah tsui2-ke thiau3 khi2 lih tse7.
石lun2 tio5 一下，水雞倒頭tsai，
Thiau3 khi2 lai5 jiok tsioh8-lun2, jiok tui3 suann-kha khi3.
一隻狗a2家己一隻真孤單。
Tsit8 tsiah kau2-a2 ka-ti7 tsit8 tsiah tsin koo-tuann.
I khuann3 tsit8 e5 lau7-lang5 ma7 bo5 phuann7,
I khuann3 hit e5 lau7-lang5 tsin koo-tuann,
Tio7 ka7 tshua7 tng2 lai5 tso3-phuann7,
Bio7-khau2 tsit8 tsiah tsioh8-sai tsin bo5-liau5.
I kio3 tsit8 tsiah kau2 lai5 sio-the3-uann7,
Siunn7 bueh tshut khi3 si3-ke3 khuann3.
Kuann2-kin2 khi3 kio3 king3-tshat kin2 lai5 kuann2.
U7 tsit8 me5, tsim2-thau5 kong2: “A-hong7 ue3!
「我 hoo7你 khue3 頭殼，khue3 tsiah tse7年。
“Gua2 hoo7 li2 khue3 thau5-khak, khue3 tsiah tse7 ni5.
“Tann, ma7 uann7 li2 hoo7 gua2 khue3.”
Gua2 ka7 hainn3 loh8 khi3 bin5-tshng5-kha khi3.
Ka7 khioh khi2 lai5 khue3 tua3 gua2 e5 pak-too2-pinn.
Phah-lah8--e5 sia7 tsinn3 khi3 lih thinn-ting2.
Tsinn3 huah kong2: “M7 ho2 pue siunn ua2!”
Ing-a2 tian-to3 jiok ua2 khi3 khuann3,
Tsinn3 tit8-tit8 tsok8; ing-a2 tit8-tit8 pue.
Tsinn3 tsok8 kah tsin7-pong7, khai-si2 tit8-tit8 puah8.
I tio7 tua7-siann huah, kong2: “Kin2 lai5 kiu3--gua2!”
Phah-lah8--e5 na2 khuann3 thinn, tan2 bo5 i e5 tsinn3.
Liam5-pinn seh8 khah kuan5，liam5-pinn seh8 khah低，
Liam5-pinn seh8 khah kuan5, liam5-pinn seh8 khah ke7,
Liam5-pinn sua2 tsiann3-ping5, liam5-pinn sua2 to3-ping5,
Seh8 lai5 seh8 khi3, seh8 be7 thing5.
Tsit8 tiau5 tshau2-soh phuah8 ti7 tshiu7-a2-ue.
Tsit8 tsiah thoo3-a2 tui3 hia kue3.
Thoo3-a2 kiann tsit8-e7 piann3 leh tsau2.
Tsit8 e5 gin2-a2 tui3 hia kue3.
Tsit8 bue2 tsua5 tui3 hia kue3.
Tsua5 kong2: “Ue3! Li2, Ta2 tsit8 thau5 si7 thau5?”
Thinn kng, tshau2-lang5 tng2 lai5 khia7 hoo7 ho2,
Siam5-khak lak loh8 e3 kah tsua5-khak tso3-hue2.
Tsiau2-a2 pue loh8 e5 tshiu7-a2-kha tshue7,
U7-e5 bu2-su7 peh khi2 lih toh-ting2 sa,
I kio3 lang5 khi3 gia5 lian2-puann5 lai5,
Tsit8 e5 bu2-su7 peh khi2 lih tse7,
Pat8 e5 bu2-su7 ka7 i tong3-tso3 tsit8 tshut tshai3.
麒麟鹿伸頷頸bueh hoo7 suh--落-來。
Ki5-lin5-lok8 tshun am7-kun2 bueh hoo7 suh--loh8-lai5.
Kau5 peh khi2 lih bueh ka7 pho7--loh8-lai5.
鷹a2飛落來bueh ka7 kuann7--落-來。
Ing-a2 pue loh8 lai5 bueh ka7 kuann7--loh8-lai5.
Ti-tu tsuann5 tua3 tshiu7-a2-kha kenn ti-tu-bang7,
Tsit8 liap8 ang5, tsit8 liap8 ng5, tsit8 liap8 tshenn,
Ban2 tng2 lai5 tiau3 tua3 sing3-tan3-tshiu7.
Kio3 San-ta2 Khu-loo3-su3 tsai3 i khi3 ban2 tshenn.
Tshiann2 lang5 kah i tso3 ping5-iu2.
Tshiu7-a2-kha, guan2 tshu3 kah lang5 teh khi2-suh.
Gua2 liam-kha kiann5 tui3 thang-a2 kue3,
Khuann3 tioh8 gua2 teh khun3, bo5 kah-phue7.
Sann e5 a-put-to2-a2 tse7 ti7 tshiunn5-thau5-a2,
Hoo7 hong tshue kah hian2--kue3-lai5, hian2--kue3-khi3.
卵殼做e5 a不倒a2 siak--落-去，
鉛phiann2做e5 a不倒a2 siak--落-去，
海綿做e5 a不倒a2 siak--落-去，
Hong ka7 i tshue loh8 khi3 kau-a2 khi3,
A-li2 Ba2-bah tsau2 kau3 suann-tong7 e5 mng5,
A-li2 Ba2-bah tsau2 kau3 te7-gak8 e5 mng5,
